code: import axios from"axios";import{base_url}from"../../utils/baseUrl";import{config}from"../../utils/axiosconfig";const getCategories=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"blog-category"));return response.data;};const createBlogCategory=async bcat=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"blog-category/"),bcat,config);return response.data;};const updateBlogCategory=async blogCat=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(base_url,"blog-category/").concat(blogCat.id),{title:blogCat.blogCatData.title},config);return response.data;};const getBlogCategory=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"blog-category/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};const deleteBlogCategory=async id=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(base_url,"blog-category/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};export const blogCategoryService={getCategories,createBlogCategory,deleteBlogCategory,getBlogCategory,updateBlogCategory};
